languages.text: "Все же одного права крови недостаточно, чтобы заработать высокую честь стать владельцем Торгового Патента. Тем не менее, твои способности и таланты могут быть весьма полезны — если не для роли Лорд-капитана, то для позиции его ближайшего соратника". {n}Теодора вздыхает и на мгновение задумчиво отводит взгляд.{/n} "Увы, даже подобные обязанности иногда оказываются не по силам тем, кто делит с тобой кровь. Кунрад Войгтвир безукоризненно служил множество лет, прежде чем совершил ошибку".

traits.locale_text: "Все же одного права крови недостаточно, чтобы заработать высокую честь стать владельцем Торгового Патента. Тем не менее, твои способности и таланты могут быть весьма полезны – если не для роли Лорд-капитана, то для позиции его ближайшего соратника". {n}Теодора вздыхает и на мгновение задумчиво отводит взгляд.{/n} "Увы, даже подобные обязанности иногда оказываются не по силам тем, кто делит с тобой кровь. Кунрад Войгтвир безукоризненно служил множество лет, прежде чем совершил ошибку".

languages.text: "Blood right alone is not enough to earn the high honour of becoming the bearer of a Warrant of Trade. Nonetheless, your abilities and talents may yet prove useful — if not for the role of Lord Captain, then for that of their closest ally." {n}Theodora sighs and looks away pensively for a brief moment.{/n} "Alas, even those responsibilities can at times be too challenging for those who share your blood. Kunrad Voigtvir served me for many years before he made his mistake."
languages.original_text: "Все же одного права крови недостаточно, чтобы заработать высокую честь стать владельцем Торгового Патента. Тем не менее, твои способности и таланты могут быть весьма полезны — если не для роли Лорд-капитана, то для позиции его ближайшего соратника". {n}Теодора вздыхает и на мгновение задумчиво отводит взгляд.{/n} "Увы, даже подобные обязанности иногда оказываются не по силам тем, кто делит с тобой кровь. Кунрад Войгтвир безукоризненно служил множество лет, прежде чем совершил ошибку".

traits.locale_text: "The right of blood alone is not enough to earn the high honour of becoming the bearer of a Warrant of Trade. Nonetheless, your abilities and talents may yet prove useful — if not for the role of the Lord Captain, then for that of their closest ally." {n}Theodora sighs and looks away pensively for a brief moment.{/n} "Alas, even those responsibilities can at times be too challenging for those who share your blood. Kunrad Voigtvir had served me for many years before he made his mistake."

"The right of blood alone is not enough to earn the high honour of becoming the bearer of a Warrant of Trade. Nonetheless, your abilities and talents may yet prove useful — if not for the role of the Lord Captain, then for that of their closest ally." {n}Theodora sighs and looks away pensively for a brief moment.{/n} "Alas, even those responsibilities can at times be too challenging for those who share your blood. Kunrad Voigtvir had served me for many years before he made his mistake."

"Blood right alone is not enough to earn the high honour of becoming the bearer of a Warrant of Trade. Nonetheless, your abilities and talents may yet prove useful — if not for the role of Lord Captain, then for that of their closest ally." {n}Theodora sighs and looks away pensively for a brief moment.{/n} "Alas, even those responsibilities can at times be too challenging for those who share your blood. Kunrad Voigtvir served me for many years before he made his mistake."

"Blood right alone is not enough to earn the high honour of becoming the bearer of a Warrant of Trade. Nonetheless, your abilities and talents may yet prove useful — if not for the role of Lord Captain, then for that of their closest ally." {n}Theodora sighs and looks away pensively for a brief moment.{/n} "Alas, even those responsibilities can at times be too challenging for those who share your blood. Kunrad Voigtvir served me for many years before he made his mistake."

"Blood right alone is not enough to earn the high honour of becoming the bearer of a Warrant of Trade. Nonetheless, your abilities and talents may yet prove useful — if not for the role of Lord Captain, then for that of their closest ally." {n}Theodora sighs and looks away pensively for a brief moment.{/n} "Alas, even those responsibilities can at times be too challenging for those who share your blood. Kunrad Voigtvir served me for many years before he made his mistake."

languages.text: “仅仅依靠血缘关系，并不足以让你赢得贸易授状这项崇高荣誉。但无论如何，你的能力与才华都会发挥作用。哪怕你无法成为领主舰长，也可以成为领主舰长最亲密的战友。”{n}西奥多拉叹了口气，短暂地沉思了一会儿。{/n}“话说回来，哪怕那些与你拥有相同血统的人，这样的职责对他们而言，有时候也太有挑战性了。昆拉德·维特威尔服侍了我这么多年，他也犯过错误。”
languages.original_text: "Blood right alone is not enough to earn the high honour of becoming the bearer of a Warrant of Trade. Nonetheless, your abilities and talents may yet prove useful — if not for the role of Lord Captain, then for that of their closest ally." {n}Theodora sighs and looks away pensively for a brief moment.{/n} "Alas, even those responsibilities can at times be too challenging for those who share your blood. Kunrad Voigtvir served me for many years before he made his mistake."

traits.locale_text: “仅仅依靠血缘关系，并不足以让你赢得贸易许可证这项崇高荣誉。但无论如何，你的能力与才华都会发挥作用。哪怕你无法成为领主舰长，也可以成为领主舰长最亲密的战友。”{n}西奥多拉叹了口气，短暂地沉思了一会儿。{/n}“话说回来，哪怕那些与你拥有相同血统的人，这样的职责对他们而言，有时候也太有挑战性了。昆拉德·维特威尔服侍了我这么多年，他也犯过错误。”

languages.text: «La sangre en sí no basta para ganarse el incomparable honor de portar una Patente de Comercio. Sin embargo, tus habilidades y talentos podrían ser útiles. Si no como Lord Capitán, como su mejor amig{mf|o|a}». {n}Theodora suspira y aparta pensativa la mirada.{/n} «Lamentablemente, incluso esa responsabilidad puede abrumar a quienes comparten tu sangre. Kunrad Voigtvir me había servido fielmente durante años hasta que cometió su error».
languages.original_text: "Blood right alone is not enough to earn the high honour of becoming the bearer of a Warrant of Trade. Nonetheless, your abilities and talents may yet prove useful — if not for the role of Lord Captain, then for that of their closest ally." {n}Theodora sighs and looks away pensively for a brief moment.{/n} "Alas, even those responsibilities can at times be too challenging for those who share your blood. Kunrad Voigtvir served me for many years before he made his mistake."

traits.locale_text: «La sangre en sí no basta para ganarse el incomparable honor de portar una Patente de Comercio. Sin embargo, tus habilidades y talentos podrían ser útiles. Si no como Lord Capitán, como su mejor amig{mf|o|a}». {n}Theodora suspira y aparta pensativa la mirada.{/n} «Lamentablemente, incluso esa responsabilidad puede abrumar a quienes comparten tu sangre. Kunrad Voigtvir me había servido fielmente durante años hasta que cometió su error».

languages.text: 「通商許可証の所持者になるという高い栄誉を得るには、血統だけでは十分ではない。それでも、あなたの能力と才能はまだ役立つかもしれない。ロード・キャプテンの役ではないにしても、それに最も近い同盟者の役割には使えるでしょう」{n}シオドーラはため息をつき、少しの間物思いにふけるように目をそらした。{/n}「悲しいかな、その責任ですら、あなたと血を分けた者たちにとっては、時として困難なことのようです。クンラッド・ボイトヴィルは、間違いを犯すまで何年も私に仕えてくれたのです」
languages.original_text: "Blood right alone is not enough to earn the high honour of becoming the bearer of a Warrant of Trade. Nonetheless, your abilities and talents may yet prove useful — if not for the role of Lord Captain, then for that of their closest ally." {n}Theodora sighs and looks away pensively for a brief moment.{/n} "Alas, even those responsibilities can at times be too challenging for those who share your blood. Kunrad Voigtvir served me for many years before he made his mistake."

traits.locale_text: 「貿易令状の所持者になるという高い栄誉を得るには、血統だけでは十分ではありません。それでも、あなたの能力と才能はまだ役立つかもしれない。ロード・キャプテンの役ではないにしても、それに最も近い同盟者の役割には使えるでしょう」{n} テオドラはため息をつき、少しの間物思いにふけるように目をそらした。{/n}「悲しいかな、その責任ですら、あなたと血を分けた者たちにとっては、時として困難なことのようです。クンラッド・ボイトヴィルは、間違いを犯すまで、何年も私に仕えてくれたのです」

「通商許可証の所持者になるという高い栄誉を得るには、血統だけでは十分ではない。それでも、あなたの能力と才能はまだ役立つかもしれない。ロード・キャプテンの役ではないにしても、それに最も近い同盟者の役割には使えるでしょう」{n}シオドーラはため息をつき、少しの間物思いにふけるように目をそらした。{/n}「悲しいかな、その責任ですら、あなたと血を分けた者たちにとっては、時として困難なことのようです。クンラッド・ボイトヴィルは、間違いを犯すまで何年も私に仕えてくれたのです」

languages.text: « Le droit du sang ne suffit pas à mériter le grand honneur d'être {mf|le détenteur|la détentrice} de la lettre de marque. Néanmoins, votre talent et vos capacités pourraient se révéler utiles... si ce n'est pour endosser le rôle de {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, au moins pour celui de proche {mf|conseiller|conseillère}. » {n}Théodora soupire et son regard se perd dans le vague pendant un court instant.{/n} « Hélas, même ces responsabilités peuvent parfois s'avérer trop lourdes à porter pour ceux qui partagent votre sang. Kunrad Voigtvir m'a servie pendant de nombreuses années avant de commettre son erreur. »
languages.original_text: "Blood right alone is not enough to earn the high honour of becoming the bearer of a Warrant of Trade. Nonetheless, your abilities and talents may yet prove useful — if not for the role of Lord Captain, then for that of their closest ally." {n}Theodora sighs and looks away pensively for a brief moment.{/n} "Alas, even those responsibilities can at times be too challenging for those who share your blood. Kunrad Voigtvir served me for many years before he made his mistake."

traits.locale_text: « Le droit du sang ne suffit pas à mériter le grand honneur d'être {mf|le détenteur|la détentrice} de la lettre de marque. Néanmoins, votre talent et vos capacités pourraient se révéler utiles... si ce n'est pour endosser le rôle de {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, au moins pour celui de proche {mf|conseiller|conseillère}. » {n}Théodora soupire et son regard se perd dans le vague pendant un court instant.{/n} « Hélas, même ces responsabilités peuvent parfois s'avérer trop lourdes à porter pour ceux qui partagent votre sang. Kunrad Voigtvir m'a servie pendant de nombreuses années avant de commettre son erreur. »

languages.text: "Das Blutrecht alleine reicht für die Ehre nicht aus, den Handelsbrief zu tragen. Dennoch könnten sich Eure Fähigkeiten und Talente als nützlich entpuppen – und wenn nicht als Lord Captain, dann als dessen {mf|engster Vertrauter|engste Vertraute}." {n}Theodora seufzt und blickt kurz nachdenklich zur Seite.{/n} "Leider kann diese Verantwortung manchmal selbst für jene zu viel sein, die Euer Blut teilen. Kunrad Voigtvir hat mir viele Jahre gedient, bevor er seinen Fehler beging."
languages.original_text: "Blood right alone is not enough to earn the high honour of becoming the bearer of a Warrant of Trade. Nonetheless, your abilities and talents may yet prove useful — if not for the role of Lord Captain, then for that of their closest ally." {n}Theodora sighs and looks away pensively for a brief moment.{/n} "Alas, even those responsibilities can at times be too challenging for those who share your blood. Kunrad Voigtvir served me for many years before he made his mistake."

traits.locale_text: "Das Blutrecht alleine reicht für die Ehre nicht aus, den Handelsbrief zu tragen. Dennoch könnten sich Eure Fähigkeiten und Talente als nützlich entpuppen – und wenn nicht als Lord Captain, dann als dessen {mf|engster Vertrauter|engste Vertraute}." {n}Theodora seufzt und blickt kurz nachdenklich zur Seite.{/n} "Leider kann diese Verantwortung manchmal selbst für jene zu viel sein, die Euer Blut teilen. Kunrad Voigtvir hat mir viele Jahre gedient, bevor er seinen Fehler beging."

languages.text: "Yalnızca kandan doğan hak, Ticari Ruhsatname'nin hamilliği yüce şerefine nail olmaya yetmez. Yine de yetenek ve kabiliyetlerin işe yarayabilir. Lord Kaptan rolü için olmasa da belki onun sağkolu olarak." {n}Theodora, iç çekiyor ve bir anlığına uzaklara dalıp gidiyor.{/n} "Ne yazık ki bu sorumluluklar bile seninle aynı kanı paylaşanlar için zaman zaman çok zorlayıcı olabiliyor. Kunrad Voigtvir hata yapmadan önce bana yıllarca hizmet etti mesela."
languages.original_text: "Blood right alone is not enough to earn the high honour of becoming the bearer of a Warrant of Trade. Nonetheless, your abilities and talents may yet prove useful — if not for the role of Lord Captain, then for that of their closest ally." {n}Theodora sighs and looks away pensively for a brief moment.{/n} "Alas, even those responsibilities can at times be too challenging for those who share your blood. Kunrad Voigtvir served me for many years before he made his mistake."

traits.locale_text: "Yalnızca kandan doğan hak, Ticari Ruhsatname'yi taşıma yüce şerefine nail olmaya yetmez. Yine de yetenek ve kabiliyetlerin işe yarayabilir. Lord Kaptan rolü için olmasa da belki onun sağkolu olarak. {n}Theodora, iç çekiyor ve bir anlığına uzaklara dalıp gidiyor.{/n} "Ne yazık ki bu sorumluluklar bile seninle aynı kanı paylaşanlar için zaman zaman çok zorlayıcı olabiliyor. Kunrad Voigtvir hata yapmadan önce bana yıllarca hizmet etti mesela."

languages.original_text: "Blood right alone is not enough to earn the high honour of becoming the bearer of a Warrant of Trade. Nonetheless, your abilities and talents may yet prove useful — if not for the role of Lord Captain, then for that of their closest ally." {n}Theodora sighs and looks away pensively for a brief moment.{/n} "Alas, even those responsibilities can at times be too challenging for those who share your blood. Kunrad Voigtvir served me for many years before he made his mistake."
